website_summaries.verdict: Though more of an accessory than a toy, this is a must-have for the collector, since small Minecraft collectibles are quite easy to lose.
pros: Organizes and provides easy visual and physical access to Minecraft collectibles
cons: It's appropriate for Minecraft minis, but some collectibles will not fit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted this mine craft case for all of his mini minecraft figures. The case is a little bit smaller then I expected. Besides the front of the case holding all the mini figures the whole backside is a minecraft cave for them to play in. My son is very happy and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom411

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little case. My four year old is going to LOVE it. He likes to play with his big brother's lego minecraft minifigs so I got him his own set of lego minifigs. The lego minecraft minifigs fit in the cube spaces as long as they are sitting down. I had to take the creeper head off and a couple others in pieces but he'll actually like that since he mainly takes them apart and rearranges them anyway (which is why big brother doesn't like him playing with his stuff lol).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for minecraft loving kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old nephew as he is a huge Minecraft fan. Overall, it is a great storage case for his miniature Minecraft figurines and is very well build. The other side from the storage compartment is a miniature pretend world, where you can play with the mini figurines (see pictures attached). No complaints from me and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable, kid loves it, works for storage, display and play
customer_reviews.text: Kid was really happy to get this as a gift, uses it for play, display, and storing his mini minecraft figurines. Great deal for the price and how much it can store. The only knock I can give this is the mechanics of the hinges/closure is a little hinky, but it hasn't broken after a few months of play so I predict it isn't going to any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you from stepping on all their little figures
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this. They are huge into Minecraft and I actually think the game teaches them some things about gardening and rocks etc. they said it fits all their figures and no, mom, none of them get stuck or can't fit. Ok ok! Just wanted to leave a nice review. He carries it all over and I didn't see it in our local rural Walmart, so he's quite happy. If you like my review, hit the little like button below. I don't receive any discounts or promos for my reviews
customer_reviews.author: pamela conklin

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box to store all those little mini minecraft figures. The only thing I would change is how difficult it is open the clear plastic doors, my son is 6 and often needs help opening it but I guess it's better than being too loose and all the figures falling out. The slots are the perfect size for the minifigures and in some cases you can fit more than one in a slot depending on the figure.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaNoelle

customer_reviews.title: Good item, well made, as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little item, perfect for those who collect the Minecraft mini-figures, which my 11 yr old is... Gave it to him for Christmas & he loved it. Holds 32 figures on the outside slots, open it up & there's a portable play area if you choose to use it. It's smaller than you think, but still a good size & it's diminutive stature makes it a good size for the kids to be able to tote around, full of figures no less, on their own. Plus it organizes tiny things...what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Just_A_Girl17

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over a year! Lots of room for shopping & Lego too! Displays nicely!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. My son loves the design that allows him to see his figures from both sides. It's held up well to many many months of extensive use. He has had it for over a year. Yeah! I truly expected the latches to break within the first week. Lol. But it has surprised me. My son also keeps shopkins and Lego figures in this as well. It holds more than most similar cases. The square almost block design that opens up for quick easy access with a carrying handle is an added bonus. My son also sits on this so I figure it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Breadsticks

customer_reviews.title: My son with Autism is a Minecraft fanatic. He ...
customer_reviews.text: My son with Autism is a Minecraft fanatic. He earns the little figures for positive behaviors. He has trouble keeping them all together in one place just the way he likes them. I purchased this case with not very high expectations because he often prefers things just so and isn't flexible on new stuff. However once I explained the case was for him to keep his lil guys organized he was over the moon. He immediately placed all of his lil guys in his case and put it on the shelf. He loves the case and eventually we will need to purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: DawnaRose

customer_reviews.title: For avid fans only.
customer_reviews.text: What to say. An over priced plastic box to hold smaller plastic globs of stuff that will hold little to no value unless you hang onto it for 30 years. Design is a little clunky. The clear plastic door is so difficult to open, that it will likely get broken. The latch that closes the clear plastic door does not open without excessive leverage. So, naturally impatient kids will break it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucious Prime

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: For the price I thought it would have been bigger, but the bigger ones are pretty expensive too. If your kid has a lot of figures do not go with this one. Also, doesn’t fit all figures only the smaller ones
customer_reviews.author: Johnny and Brianna

customer_reviews.title: This Is The Perfect Case For Your Mini Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: This Is The Perfect Case For Your Mini Minecraft!! My Son Also Has Some Of His Grossery Gang Things In Here. He Loves Opening It Up To Play With All The Minis Inside If You Haven't Seen It Has A Little Play Area On The Other Side And It's Finally Nice To Have A Place To Put Them So The Dogs Dont Eat Them And They Dont Get Lost. If Only He Would Keep Them In There! He Is 5 Almost 6. Perfect For Your Minecraft Lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Mattitties69

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea these existed until I came across this. Of course I had to get it for my son. He had tons of those little minecraft figures laying around. We love this product and I'm happy I got it for him. He has a space to store all his people. It even opens and has alittle area to play or you could store more people inside! I'd buy again once this one runs out of space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft mini case is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves this case to put his minecraft minis in.It encourages him to keep them put away instead of throwing them all over the house.He is so proud of his minis and his case and loves to show them to his friends and family.We are going to buy the other case on here and likely a couple more of these ones.They are well built and sturdy also.I highly recommend Amazon and the toy company who supplied these cases.My grandson really likes his! Thank you for reading my review.Ms. Christina McCoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Can double up figs too!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this mini-figure case for his 5th birthday. He has really enjoyed it. He loves to collect minifigs so i thought this as perfect. We are even able to double up or sometimes triple up minis per cubby slot. Often we get multiples so we fit as many as we can in the same hole. It is made very well. Easily travels. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my youngest son and he loves it. It's a great way for him to display his figures and he can play in/on it with the figures as well. He loves to carry it around by the handle. Its the perfect size. It's not too small and not too big to take places. The case only fits the mini figures not the regular size figures so be sure that you are buying it for the correct size. Made well and works great opening and closing easily. This was his favorite gift for his birthday and he has shown all his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S

customer_reviews.title: NEAT COLLECTORS CASE
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice case for Mine Craft collectors. Bought this case for my 6-year-old grandson who had his Mine Craft collection in a Zip Loc bag. The case closes as a cube with the display windows showing on both sides. When you open the case, the inside reveals a cave play section where you can place the Mine Craft for battle scenes, etc. Neat case!
customer_reviews.author: Nascar Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding minifigures
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son who collects the Minecraft minifigures. Wonder case to store the figures and opens to a cute play scene for the figures. Super fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Diane D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice organization
customer_reviews.text: Nice way for my son to organize his mini figures and keep them all in one spot. Two minifigures can fit in each slot also, so this works great for some of the ones that are doubles. Nice handle which is helpful for getting to his room and taking to friends houses. The other side has a kind of an area to play with the minifigures. Amazon is way cheaper then target fyi!
customer_reviews.author: chastity

customer_reviews.title: Fun Way To Store & Play!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and a great way to store and play with your Minecraft mini figures! A little smaller than expected for the price, but the smaller size isn’t too bulky, either to store conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: thought it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: i was so excited to get this for my son for Christmas so he hasn't seen it yet. i thought it was a lot bigger then it is. im sure he will love it anyway to carry his little figures but i thought it was bigger. he is going to be vry happy i bought him new figures too. he is obsessed with minecraft
customer_reviews.author: Dawnmarie

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft collectoion case
customer_reviews.text: The Minecraft collector case is the ideal gift for the Mini figure collector. It is ruggedly made to keep the characters safe in their own little compartment. The tote has a play surface on the opposite side to the 32 collector niches. It closes securely for carrying and has the icon Minecraft cube shape. The handle makes it super easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: FVines

customer_reviews.title: Cool place to play with and store the mini figures
customer_reviews.text: Cool place to play with and store the mini figures, but the plastic door that holds the figures in is VERY difficult for my seven and five year old to open and close. I bought three of these and have been disappointed that they are not more used in my house. I was hoping for this to be the answer to getting the small figures off my floor, but it is not :(
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing your mini figure collection!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is an avid Minecraft fan and has a nice collection of mini figures, so she needed something to store them in. This case fit the bill perfectly, and she loves it. It's great for displaying, storing, transporting, and even playing with the mini figures. It looks good on her shelf and is easy to use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great case for Minecraft figures or even Grossery Gang or Shopkins!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for my son's minecraft collection. They also hold Shopkins perfectly or even the new Grossery Gang figures. The door stays closed so you don't have to worry about them falling out when you carry the case with you. And they are durable and don't break if your child drops it! We bought 2 and will probably buy 2 more for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Love and so cute and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this box for my son's small Minecraft characters! He was so happy and now takes such good care of them with this case and carries it everywhere! Now I need to get another one for my younger son! Thank you! Super fast shipping as well! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Perry

customer_reviews.title: I felt like for the money
customer_reviews.text: I felt like for the money, this could have been bigger but my daughter just doubled up. If you kid has a lot (mine has over 80) of these figures, you may need two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan B.

customer_reviews.title: Study, roomy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and decent size. My kids have several Minecraft Mini-Figs and this is not only perfect for their storage but also for play. They make stop motion videos and the fact that this has a built in cave is a huge plus. I'm sure Steve and all his companions will live happily in this magical little unit! Plus it was a lot cheaper than in the stores, another reason to love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrying case, but difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect carrying case for all the Minecraft mini figures; however, I'm not giving 5 stars because it's pretty difficult for my 5-year-old and 7-year-old grandkids to open. It's even difficult for Grandma and Grandpa to open (LOL)!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great size for travel as well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year old who has taken a recent interest in collecting the mini figures. He absolutely loves being able to carry his collection around. He is able to open/close the case with no problems, and when he isn't storing them on the outside, he uses the inside maze for playtime with his mini figures. This is a great size for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great place to store the Minecraft pieces, but it's a little bulky and probably could have stored more if designed differently. Some waste of space within the carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Ourania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing the Minecraft guys
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is awesome! It is well-built, holds a lot of guys, has a play area on the back, and is the perfect size. I wish I would have purchased this earlier for my Minecraft enthusiast. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AK2017

customer_reviews.title: Nine year old girl just loved the Minecraft case
customer_reviews.text: Nine year old girl just loved the Minecraft case. She was thrilled with it and couldn't wait to play with it with the Minecraft figures. It is a cute little size and she liked the idea that she could store on one side and play on the other. When I say little size, I mean it was just also the perfect size with a handle on top. Cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Minecraft fans who collect the minifigures
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Minecraft fans who collect the minifigures. My son also received a Minecraft movie maker set to make stop motion movies and he incorporates the other side of this into the "set". Before we were just using a craft box with separators so this really makes his set accessible and much cooler. Would buy again as a gift any day.
customer_reviews.author: M&M Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My brother is 7 and loves these. They’re his new favorite toys
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift.... And it made me a hero. My son loves this, he said it can actually fit 2 mini figures in each compartment instead of the advertised 1 per compartment. Plus you can put the mini figures on display in the back of the box. I am glad now that I didn't go with a knock off brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Esparza

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his mini minecraft figurines and this is pretty much the only way we would ever be able ...
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS if you are a mom who values a place for these little dudes! My son loves his mini minecraft figurines and this is pretty much the only way we would ever be able to find them all. It's a nice display to see what they have as well. The inside folds out into a play area, making it a great road trip item as well.
customer_reviews.author: Staci L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have been longer than what it is but the photo shown is the case opened up. Still an awesome collector case to store in the mini figures. Also makes an awesome mine craft fan gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Safe from Lost Toys!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for keeping all of the Mini Minecraft Figures. My stepson loves it, and I appreciate that his toys aren't everywhere because they are well kept in his case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Son has gotten more then one of these display cases ...
customer_reviews.text: Son has gotten more then one of these display cases.. They are well built and he filled this one also with his minecraft figures
customer_reviews.author: SHARON SAUNDERS

customer_reviews.title: Better priced on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This is handy for storing mini figures as well as play with them. It is a little smaller than I expected but works fine nonetheless. It does not come with any figures but for this price I did not expect it to. Cheaper here than other big box retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Minecraft mini-fig collections
customer_reviews.text: My boys both love all things Minecraft and have begun to amass quite the collection of mini figs. This is a fun way for them to store their collection. Works as advertised and in fact we'll probably be buying a second one (different color) in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: My son has used this day one for all kinds ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this day one for all kinds of stuff. It is a solid built collector case. He travels with it, and it does well on trips. It worth the cost, since we now have a place to put many of his little toys.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality and holds up real well but wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: Much small than pictured. It is good quality and holds up real well but wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Weems

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage and play.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this. He collects mini figures and mentioned this about a hundred times. I liked that it holds the figures on one side and the other side has a world for him to play with the figures. It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for a 6 yr. old!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to love this case as my Christmas present to him. He'll be able to have all his Minecraft figures in the case, instead of dumped with other types of figures in a bin. I can't wait to give it to him!
customer_reviews.author: ladydee82955

customer_reviews.title: A Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to store all those Minecraft minis. I purchased this as a gift for my son, and he loves it. He's able to store all his Minecraft minis in one place. The front of the cube is a storage area, the back of it is a cave for them to play w/ their Minecraft minis in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: It is in great shape and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item from Amazon Warehouse deals. It is in great shape and my son loves it. Holds way more than the stated amount of figures because some can be doubled up in the compartments and even more can be stored inside with the play area.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should've paid closer attention to the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should've paid closer attention to the product dimensions. This was a TON smaller than I originally thought. Makes sense since it's houses mini figures, but I'm questioning the price tag for something so small (since it's supposed to double as a playset).
customer_reviews.author: S Mars-Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for collecting
customer_reviews.text: Great storage container, entertains both my son and daughter for hours of pretend play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Minecraft mini-figure storage
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of storage for those little Minecraft characters. It folds into a cube.When open, the back side is a play stage.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thornton

customer_reviews.title: This will be perfect to store all of his peppa pig figures
customer_reviews.text: Recieved and it's under the tree for my 3 year old pig fanatic. This will be perfect to store all of his peppa pig figures.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Minecraft obsessed kiddo and she LOVES it. Uses the case to cart around all her little figurines (even the non minecraft ones) and absolutely adores the little figurines. Great for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this storage box/play set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for storing his mini figures in! The play set inside is great and fits the figurines perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice purchase. It's smaller than I imagined, but that's okay. My son loves it. And, this is the cheapest you'll find it. The stores want $30+ for this! Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bearr

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft figures case....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he loves it. He carries all his Minecraft figures in it. It's plastic but well made. The smile on his face was worth the price. As with most all Amazon purchases, it arrived on time and packaged to protect against transportation bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G.

customer_reviews.title: Child approved!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing!! Now it’s time to fill it or the max!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a Minecraft lover
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old LOVED this collector case and played with it all day.
customer_reviews.author: mander4ever

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what my grandson needed for all his little mini mind craft figurines
customer_reviews.author: Sheryle Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for Minecraft mini collectors.
customer_reviews.text: My son has played with his miniatures more than any other gift received this year & this storage case is perfect to keep them organized in. It even has a little play type area. Great, compact. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MoonShineArtSpot

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for minis
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for the Minecraft fan in my life. It's a great case for storing all the characters in. Just be aware that only the mini sizes will fit.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes opens too easily causing figures to fall out if moved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this for displaying her minifigure collection. Sometimes opens too easily causing figures to fall out if moved.
customer_reviews.author: matt carpenter

customer_reviews.title: ... son loves his mini figs and this case is awesome to keep them in control
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his mini figs and this case is awesome to keep them in control. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for the mini minecraft collector! I will say some of the newer more oddly shaped mini figures do not fit as well but for a child it still works. It is very durable and not cheaply made. I found my son using it as a step stool and it did not phase the product. :/
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing minecraft mini figures!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son needed this case after his 3 year old sister raided his Minecraft stash. She isn't able to get into this, so it works perfectly! My son absolutely loves it, and keeps reorganizing his figures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: No figures
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with any figures so if you're expecting figures with this there's none. I should of checked the description. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Figueroa Jr

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my great grandson to store and play with his mini Minecraft figures. He’s all about everything Minecraft, and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Weed

customer_reviews.title: When they say mini they aren't kidding! This was ...
customer_reviews.text: When they say mini they aren't kidding! This was a lot smaller than it looked in the pic, but that's my fault for not reading the dimensions. Cute carry case for kids
customer_reviews.author: Faith*Family*Love

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Its super cool and holds everything in a nice and orderly manner. Whether or not you want to collect every single one, or just a handful of em, its essential to have.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Orwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sooo cute! I am collecting these sets and keeping them in their original wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: Lustifer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wish both sides had compartments for the characters, but my son loves it as is.

customer_reviews.title: Stuff it
customer_reviews.text: It's full So much fun collecting sets Some doubles, she's okay with that really

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and husband love playing with the mine area on the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and husband love playing with the mine area on the back of this, and now we know which figures she has because they're visible all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Fits more than stated qty if you put two of the mini figures in each location. Daughter loves it and it was a good price when compared to the price for the exact same thing in the mall
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Dual use!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this thing! Not only to store his minis but the flip side can be used to play and also store extra minis if he needs.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with any figurines. I bought several packs ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with any figurines. I bought several packs of different figurines to go with this that were suggested to buy with this product but they don't fit. The holes are really tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Collector Case!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas and he totally loves it!! Heavy Duty and has alot of room to carry all his Minecraft Mini Figures! Portable which makes it easy to take everywhere! Now to start buying more Minecraft Minifigures as we still have lots of compartments to fill up!
customer_reviews.author: jessica gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Too mini for his mini's
customer_reviews.text: bought for birthday gift for grandsons "Mini's" but all boxes were too small.... useless1

customer_reviews.title: Definitely pick this up if you love the minis
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper than in the store. Same thing though, and it's gorgeous! Works fine, looks great. Holds all my minis!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any minecraft fan
customer_reviews.text: Cool little carrying case. My 7 year old son loves it. Keeps all his figures organized and he is into the little play area on the back. He was very excited to get this for christmas.

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! Our son loves having a place to play ...

customer_reviews.text: This is extremely cute display case for all those little Minecraft mystery box figures. My daughter loves it! I will be buying another one for my son!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. Its perfect storage for her Minecraft figures ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. Its perfect storage for her Minecraft figures as well as her growing mineral collection.

customer_reviews.title: great item.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and solid . I am sure my granddaughter will love it.

customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to keep my son's Minecraft collection in 1 place... However, he has outgrown it now but luckily he can store the extra figures inside the cube.

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this!! He stores all of his collected figured in this! Great find :) Very happy kiddo= very happy momma!

product_meta.title: Minecraft Mini Figure Collector Case
product_meta.description: Now you have a way to safely store and display all your collectible Mini Figures! Featured in perfect cube shape, this Minecraft Collector Case is designed to hold 32 mini-figures (not included) so that you never have to be without your personal collection of characters. The case also doubles as a play set! Turn the display side over to reveal a Minecraft-inspired environment for which to play with your mini-figures. Close up the case and carry it by the handle - the world of Minecraft goes where you go!
feature_bullets: Safely store and display all your collectible Mini-Figures!
The Minecraft Collector Case doubles as a fun play set
Mini-figures are stored on one side and played with on the other side
Case easily closes shut and includes a handle so that you can carry the world of Minecraft with you anywhere!
A great gift for any Minecraft fan
